llmDecision.text: ThisUX design studio (often styled as ThisUX) is run by Sanju S (also known as Spikey Sanju) — he is the founder and leads the studio as a design-led product studio focusing on UX/UI and digital product design. Additionally, the company Thisux Private Limited is officially registered in Tamil Nadu, India, and lists Sivalingam Sanjay and Sivalingam Raghul as its directors. So in practice: • Sanju S (Spikey Sanju) is the creative founder and the public face running ThisUX studio operations. • Legally, the business entity is directed by Sivalingam Sanjay and Sivalingam Raghul.
